favourite.article: O Lord, we are so empty without You. Many people wander in this earth searching for You but hallelujah that we have found You! Lord, You are so honest and so true. How can I not love such a One, for you brought life and meaning into me! Lord Jesus, I love You.

"Was a cry for something real. {{{Don’t you lie to me, world!}}} A search in His Word found my hardened heart softened, And earth’s vanities faded. O Lord Jesus, how I LOVE YOU You brought LIFE into me."
O Lord Jesus, how I love You!
Hallelujah! Earth’s vanities faded in the brightness of His presence when Jesus came into me.
Praise the Lord! Now we are always together, Growing into God's fullness. Oh Lord Jesus How I love You, You brought life into me. May we continue to pursue the Lord and just gain Him every day.

I enjoy that we are wandering in the dessert because of the lies of the world but the Lords story helps us to find a path, not to wander. The Lord is just waiting for us just around the corner. Amen PRAISE THE LORD!

Our new search! If you have been raised to life along with Christ, seek with your hearts things above and focus your attention on things up there, not on things on earth.
So put to death wicked cravings--and (Col. 3:16) sing to the Lord with grateful hearts.

Oh Lord Jesus!
This song really moves me every time I read the lyrics. As much as I hate to say it, I am brought to almost joyful tears as I realize what the Lord has done for me.

Oh! My life WAS as the first stanza: wandering days, increasingly empty, gap, vain seek, dark. My mirth was a cry because the world is a liar. BUT Jesus came into me! Now we’re always together growing into God’s fullness! He brought life into me! Hallelujah!
The lyrics of this song are so real and true.
